languages.text: {n}Голос Хейнрикса превращается в разъяренное шипение.{/n} "Привилегии Вольного Торговца не безграничны, {name}. Я в своем праве карать ересь, и тебе следует быть благодарн{mf|ым|ой} за то, что я избавился лишь от орудия!"

{n}Heinrix's voice drops to a hiss:{/n} "A Rogue Trader's privileges have their limits, {name}. I have the right to punish heresy, and you should be thankful that I disposed of the Engine and only the Engine!"
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Хейнрикса превращается в разъяренное шипение.{/n} "Привилегии Вольного Торговца не безграничны, {name}. Я в своем праве карать ересь, и тебе следует быть благодарн{mf|ым|ой} за то, что я избавился лишь от орудия!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's voice drops to a hiss.{/n} "A Rogue Trader's privileges have their limits, {name}. I have the right to punish heresy, and you should be thankful that I disposed of the Engine alone!"
{n}Heinrix's voice drops to a hiss.{/n} "A Rogue Trader's privileges have their limits, {name}. I have the right to punish heresy, and you should be thankful that I disposed of the Engine alone!"

{n}Heinrix's voice drops to a hiss:{/n} "A Rogue Trader's privileges have their limits, {name}. I have the right to punish heresy, and you should be thankful that I disposed of the Engine and only the Engine!"

{n}Heinrix's voice drops to a hiss:{/n} "A Rogue Trader's privileges have their limits, {name}. I have the right to punish heresy, and you should be thankful that I disposed of the Engine and only the Engine!"

{n}Heinrix's voice drops to a hiss:{/n} "A Rogue Trader's privileges have their limits, {name}. I have the right to punish heresy, and you should be thankful that I disposed of the Engine and only the Engine!"

languages.text: {n}La voix d'Heinrix se réduit à un sifflement.{/n} « Les privilèges d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ne sont pas illimités, {name}. J'ai le droit de punir l'hérésie, et vous devriez vous estimer {mf|heureux|heureuse} que je me sois arrêté à la machine ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice drops to a hiss:{/n} "A Rogue Trader's privileges have their limits, {name}. I have the right to punish heresy, and you should be thankful that I disposed of the Engine and only the Engine!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix d'Heinrix se réduit à un sifflement.{/n} « Les privilèges d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ne sont pas illimités, {name}. J'ai le droit de punir l'hérésie, et vous devriez vous estimer {mf|heureux|heureuse} que je me sois arrêté à la machine ! »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Stimme senkt sich zu einem Zischen:{/n} "Die Privilegien {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} haben ihre Grenzen, {name}. Ich habe das Recht, Ketzerei zu bestrafen, und Ihr solltet dankbar sein, dass ich die Maschine und nur die Maschine entsorgt habe!"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice drops to a hiss:{/n} "A Rogue Trader's privileges have their limits, {name}. I have the right to punish heresy, and you should be thankful that I disposed of the Engine and only the Engine!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Stimme senkt sich zu einem Zischen:{/n} "Die Privilegien {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} haben ihre Grenzen, {name}. Ich habe das Recht, Ketzerei zu bestrafen, und Ihr solltet dankbar sein, dass ich die Maschine und nur die Maschine entsorgt habe!"

languages.text: {n}La voz de Heinrix se convierte en un siseo:{/n} «Incluso los privilegios de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente tienen sus límites, {name}. Estoy autorizado a castigar la herejía, ¡y debería dar gracias de que me haya limitado a deshacerme del ingenio y nada más!».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice drops to a hiss:{/n} "A Rogue Trader's privileges have their limits, {name}. I have the right to punish heresy, and you should be thankful that I disposed of the Engine and only the Engine!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Heinrix se convierte en un siseo:{/n} «Incluso los privilegios de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente tienen sus límites, {name}. Estoy autorizado a castigar la herejía, ¡y debería dar gracias de que me haya limitado a deshacerme del ingenio y nada más!».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの声がうなるような音に変わる。{/n}「自由開拓者の特権にも限度があるんです、{name}さん。我には異端を裁く権利がある。エンジンは始末したが、エンジンだけで済んだことを感謝するんだな！」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice drops to a hiss:{/n} "A Rogue Trader's privileges have their limits, {name}. I have the right to punish heresy, and you should be thankful that I disposed of the Engine and only the Engine!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの声がうなるような音に変わる。{/n}「自由開拓者の特権にも限度があるんです、{name}さん。我には異端を裁く権利がある。エンジンは始末したが、エンジンだけで済んだことを感謝するんだな！」

languages.text: {n}海因里希发出了嘶嘶声。{/n}“即便是行商浪人，也无权为所欲为，{name}。我有权惩处异端邪说，你应该感谢我处理掉了这台恶魔引擎，而且，你得感谢我仅仅处理了它！”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice drops to a hiss:{/n} "A Rogue Trader's privileges have their limits, {name}. I have the right to punish heresy, and you should be thankful that I disposed of the Engine and only the Engine!"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希发出了嘶嘶声。{/n}“即便是行商浪人，也无权为所欲为，{name}。我有权惩处异端邪说，你应该感谢我处理掉了这台恶魔引擎，而且，你得感谢我仅仅处理了它！”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in sesi, yerini bir tıslamaya bırakıyor.{/n} "Bir Hür Tacir'in ayrıcalıklarının sınırı vardır {name}. Kâfirliği cezalandırma hakkına sahibim, yalnızca Motor'u ortadan kaldırdığım için şükran duymalısın!"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice drops to a hiss:{/n} "A Rogue Trader's privileges have their limits, {name}. I have the right to punish heresy, and you should be thankful that I disposed of the Engine and only the Engine!"
